src/serial/zsc-dgr-src/update.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Update velocity and pressure in the order parameter grid for the dual grid D2Q5/D2Q9 Zheng-Shu-Chew multiphase LBM. This function uses a bilinear interpolation of the values in the momentum grid to update the order parameter grid values.
